long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
yt-loops, a small extension to create small loops of youtube videos! 

For example, if you are listening to your favorite song, and want to loop that ONE part, you can put the cursor at the beginning, click on “set start”, then go at the end, click “set end”, and then start the loop.

But that’s not all, you can create multiple loops, you can enable or disable them, and when you have multiple loops enabled, when one section is over, it goes to the next one forming a chain that loops forever!
